item.title: Me Myself and I
item.description: So, this is my first draft. That means… don’t take it too seriously and don’t judge this that hard lol. It’s hard to summarize a person in words, because persons are infinite. What can I say about myself? That is way better to get to know me in person. But maybe I can share something new or not that obvious through this post. Here some facts about me: I’m + (bulletpoint) dynamic: I like to stay always active.
